definitions.definition: To put in place to perform a task.
examples: The host stationed me at the front door to greet visitors.
I was stationed on the pier.

definitions.definition: To put in place to perform military duty.
examples: They stationed me overseas just as fighting broke out.
I was stationed at Fort Richie.

main_definition: ( usually passive ) To put in place to perform a task.
secondary_definitions: To put in place to perform military duty.
